entry.title: $2499 // Prime C. Heights huge 2BR tons of light near trains, park, bars no fee
entry.content:
NO FEE

Stunning 2 bedroom on Crown St with high ceilings. Large living room with exposed brick.Two Large bedrooms with closets and storage. Oak wood floors. Stainless steel kitchen. Fully tiled bathroom with large soaking tub.Heat and hot water included.Near Prospect Park,Brooklyn Museum and a short walk to Franklin Ave bars and restaurants. Near the 2 and 5 trains.

NO FEE
First & Security to move in
Heat/Hot water included
Pets welcome!

entry.title: $2350 // SUNNY SPACIOUS 2 BEDROOM CLOSE TO EVERYTHING 2,3,5,Q&B TRAINS
entry.content:
RENT STABILIZED!
PET FRIENDLY!
GREAT SHARE!
GREAT LOCATION!
Carroll Street between Bedford and Rogers Avenue.
Large renovated 2 bedrooms in a quiet well kept 4 story walk up building.
Sparkling apartment featuring hardwood floors, mint modern kitchen and bath including stainless steel appliances.
Located on a beautiful tree lined block near subways, shopping, dining, Brooklyn Botanic Garden and Prospect Park.
